text: The Polynesian narrative or Polynesian mythology are the oral traditions of the Polynesian people. ==Related pages== * Austronesian peoples == References == * Beckwith, Martha, Hawaiian Mythology, Yale University Press, 1940, as re- issued in 1970, University of Hawaii Press * * * * , first published in English in 1898, available as Bernice P. Bishop Museum Special Publication 2, Second Edition, 1951, reprinted 1971. Category:Polynesia Category:Mythology
title: Polynesian mythology
